name: New York Federal Reserve Foreign Exchange
description: Historical foreign exchange is available in XML files that conform to the emerging Statistical Data and Metadata Exchange (SDMX) standard for use in automated processes. These files are supported by structures, schemas and code lists that also conform to SDMX.
